commenter_a: It's just like the shaved pubes issue - all the same arguments. 'I do it for myself' etc etc. Look, virtually no young women shaved their pubes before porn videos made men expect it. And virtually no older women dyed their hair before looking our age became unacceptable. I've had enough of all this 'I do it for me' nonsense - look a bit deeper for god's sake and let's be a bit more honest about our motives and the forces that drive us.
